title: November Jobs Day And Infrastructure
itunes:title: November Jobs Day And Infrastructure
description:
Dana Peterson, Chief Economist and Center Leader of Economy, Strategy, and Finance at The Conference Board, breaks down the November jobs report. Joanie Bily, Chief Workforce Analyst at EmployBridge, talks about employment amid inflation and the emergence of the Omicron variant. Tom Gimbel, Founder & CEO of the LaSalle Network, talks about the state of employment in the US. Joe Mastrangelo, Chief Executive Officer of Eos Energy Enterprises, talks about President Biden’s infrastructure bill, battery research, and renewables. Hosted by Matt Miller and Taylor Riggs.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
